name: GiveMoney
usage: Use this action when you want to give money to another character.

parameters.name: target_character
parameters.description: The name of the character to give money to

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of money to give

examples: Sharing money with someone in need
requirements: Target character must be nearby and interactable
Actor must have enough money to give
whenToUse: Need to give a monetary gift
